sentences.english: This is only done as an offering at Japanese funerals.
sentences.chinese: 這種行爲只會在日本葬禮作爲供奉先人的習俗進行。

sentences.english: And those who dared to gainsay the wisdom of the fathers were shunned by all decent people.
sentences.chinese: 誰否定先人的智慧，誰就會遭到正派人的冷落。

sentences.english: It always pays to put others before yourself.
sentences.chinese: 先人後己永遠是值得的。

sentences.english: People visit their ancestors' Graves to sweep away the dirt.
sentences.chinese: 人們到先人的墳頭上掃墓。

sentences.english: Even the feng shui of the tombs of your head ancestors will influence your life.
sentences.chinese: 就連先人墳墓的風水也會影響你的生活。

sentences.english: ARabari woman in Gujarat visits the grave of an ancestor.
sentences.chinese: 古吉拉特的一位拉巴尼婦女拜謁先人的陵墓。

sentences.english: We are all standing on the cultural soil of their ancestors to speak.
sentences.chinese: 我們都是站在先人的文化土壤上發言。

sentences.english: The Qingming Festival in spring is the occasion for visiting  ancestral graves.
sentences.chinese: 清明節是掃墓拜祭先人的日子。

sentences.english: Only surmount oneself constantly can set the pace.
sentences.chinese: 只有不斷超越自我，方以先人一步。

sentences.english: With the traditional handmade pounding method, Heirui has preserved sixty years of good taste.
sentences.chinese: 承襲先人手工搥打古法，保存一甲子的純真美味。

sentences.english: Are Singaporeans unwilling to accept what their ancestors have bequeathed them?
sentences.chinese: 新加坡人都不願繼承先人的遺產嗎？

sentences.english: In the period of the early Qin Dynasty, people had already paid attention to synonyms.
sentences.chinese: 早在先秦時期，我們的先人即已注意到了同義詞問題。

sentences.english: It was your ancestors who joined.

definition: worthy predecessor/distinguished person of the past/former sage
to pay careful attention to one's parents' funerary rites
people from ancient times/the ancients/the late (i.e. person who has passed away)
to offer sacrifices to one's ancestors
